title: kOdaNDapANi
sahitya:
kOdaNDapANi aruL kOrinapin Edu bhayam shol manamE


anupallavi

  kOdillAda jAnakiyuDan ghOra vanam naDandu mA tavattOr magizha manida vAzhvai vAzvitta mAdhavan


caraNam    kaNaiyonril karadUSaNarai vadaittu tuNai kETTa sugrIva vibhISaNarai aNaittu
 aNaikaDand-ilankai akkaraiyirutta iNaiyil vIran punitan inakula tilakan karuNaikk-
